subject: Guest post pitch: What I learned from nearly 10 years of copy trading
body:
Hi Jeremy,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog. I've been copy trading on eToro since 2016 and have documented the whole journey across 335 YouTube videos and socialtradingvlog.com.

I'd love to write a guest post for Modest Money:

"Copy Trading on eToro: An Honest Review After Nearly 10 Years"

I'd cover:

- The hidden costs most reviews don't mention (spreads, overnight fees, currency conversion)
- How to evaluate which traders to copy (and the red flags to watch for)
- Common beginner mistakes I made and how to avoid them
- Whether copy trading is worth it as a hands-off investing approach

This isn't a theoretical piece â€” it's based on nearly a decade of real-money experience with video evidence to back it up. Happy to match your editorial style.

Let me know if you're interested!

Cheers,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
